languages.text: "Кощунники устроили логово в благословенном отсеке, чтобы посмеяться над нашей верой!"
"The heretics have made their lair in a hallowed compartment. They seek to make a mockery of our great faith!"
languages.original_text: "Кощунники устроили логово в благословенном отсеке, чтобы посмеяться над нашей верой!"

traits.locale_text: "The heretics have made their lair in a hallowed compartment to make a mockery of our faith!"
"The heretics have made their lair in a hallowed compartment to make a mockery of our faith!"
"The heretics have made their lair in a hallowed compartment. They hope to make a mockery of our great faith!"
"The heretics have made their lair in a hallowed compartment. They hope to make a mockery of our great faith!"
"The heretics have made their lair in a hallowed compartment. They seek to make a mockery of our great faith!"
"The heretics have made their lair in a hallowed compartment. They seek to make a mockery of our great faith!"
"The heretics have made their lair in a hallowed compartment. They seek to make a mockery of our great faith!"

languages.text: "Die Ketzer haben sich in einem heiligen Modul versteckt. Sie machen unseren großen Glauben zum Gespött!"
languages.original_text: "The heretics have made their lair in a hallowed compartment. They seek to make a mockery of our great faith!"

traits.locale_text: "Die Ketzer haben sich in einem heiligen Modul versteckt. Sie machen unseren großen Glauben zum Gespött!"

languages.text: « Les hérétiques ont élu domicile dans un compartiment sacré. Décidément, ils sont prêts à tout pour tourner en dérision notre auguste foi ! »
languages.original_text: "The heretics have made their lair in a hallowed compartment. They seek to make a mockery of our great faith!"

traits.locale_text: « Les hérétiques ont élu domicile dans un compartiment sacré. Décidément, ils sont prêts à tout pour tourner en dérision notre auguste foi ! »

languages.text: «Estos herejes han situado su guarida en un compartimento sagrado. ¡Buscan mofarse de nuestra fe!».
languages.original_text: "The heretics have made their lair in a hallowed compartment. They seek to make a mockery of our great faith!"

traits.locale_text: «Estos herejes han situado su guarida en un compartimento sagrado. ¡Buscan mofarse de nuestra fe!».

languages.text: 「異端者たちは神聖な区画に巣を作ったわ。彼らは我々の偉大な信仰を嘲笑しようとしている！」
languages.original_text: "The heretics have made their lair in a hallowed compartment. They seek to make a mockery of our great faith!"

traits.locale_text: 「異端者たちは神聖な区画に巣を作ったわ。彼らは我々の偉大な信仰を嘲笑しようとしている！」

languages.text: “那些异端分子居然把这个神圣的房间当成了他们的巢穴！他们这是在嘲弄我们伟大的信仰！”
languages.original_text: "The heretics have made their lair in a hallowed compartment. They seek to make a mockery of our great faith!"

traits.locale_text: “那些异端分子居然把这个神圣的房间当成了他们的巢穴！他们这是在嘲弄我们伟大的信仰！”

languages.original_text: "The heretics have made their lair in a hallowed compartment. They seek to make a mockery of our great faith!"

languages.text: "Kâfirler, kutsal kompartımanı yuva edinmiş. Yüce inancımızla alay etme peşindeler!"
languages.original_text: "The heretics have made their lair in a hallowed compartment. They seek to make a mockery of our great faith!"
